text:
@Mike_Pence @VP Covid-19 Update Thurs 6/4
Closed cases 42.5% up .5  in 24 hrs
Open cases  57.4%
Recovered 707,752
daily recovered 19,082
daily deaths 1,029

USA daily new cases (21,938) exceed closed cases (20,111) 
+1,827

trend closed exceeding new ends 3rd day
Back to work, don't be afraid.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
